item.title: Orsted 首席财务官称定价反应平淡是股票出售的好兆头
item.description: Orsted A/S 的首席财务官 Trond Westlie 表示，市场对这家风力发电公司 94 亿美元的供股定价反应平淡，这对股票销售来说是一个积极的信号。【原文：Orsted A/S’s Chief Financial Officer Trond Westlie said the muted market reaction to the pricing of the wind power firm’s $9.4 billion rights offering was a positive sign for the share sale.】

item.title: 墨西哥向市场出售三部分欧洲债券为墨西哥石油公司提供资金
item.description: 墨西哥正在寻求出售欧元债券，这是它为支持负债累累的国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）而采取的最新举措。【原文：Mexico is looking to sell eurobonds, the latest step in its campaign to support the debt-laden state-owned oil company Petroleos Mexicanos.】

item.title: 南非电力削减减少，OUTsurance 盈利大增
item.description: 由于南非停电事故明显减少，索赔减少，帮助将利润提高到三年来的最高点，OUTsurance Group Ltd. 的涨幅达到一年来最大。【原文：OUTsurance Group Ltd. rose the most in a year as a marked decline in South African power cuts reduced claims and helped lift profit to a three-year high.】

item.title: 纽约被撤销的核电厂或将获得缓刑
item.description:
随着清洁电力需求的膨胀，印度发电站的所有者并不排除重启的可能性。【原文：

Indian Point’s owner is not ruling out a restart as demand for clean power balloons.

】

item.title: 野村聘请美国银行伊马莫格鲁为土耳其经济学家
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.）在一封电子邮件声明中称，该公司从美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. hired Zumrut Imamoglu from Bank of America Corp. as senior Turkey economist in its Global Macro Research team in London, effective Sept. 8, the bank said in an emailed statement.】

item.title: 降息后斯里兰卡经济增速加快
item.description: 斯里兰卡上一季度的经济增长快于预期，原因是较低的利率促进了商业活动，并缓解了一些与关税相关的痛苦。【原文：Sri Lanka’s economy grew faster-than-expected last quarter, as lower interest rates aided business activity and eased some tariff-related pain.】

item.title: 苹果新款 iPhone 的吸引力在于核心技术而非人工智能
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）详述了他对继续成为 iPhone 忠实用户的疑虑。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr details his misgivings about remaining a loyal iPhone user.】

item.title: 中国会跟随美联储降息吗？
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天，我们将关注中国经济放缓以及是否需要降息。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. item.title: 国防科技制造初创企业 Divergent 估值 23 亿美元
item.description: Divergent Technologies Inc. 在新一轮融资中获得了 23 亿美元的估值，这家初创公司扩大了为美国武器公司提供的服务— 使其成为最新一家吸引投资者关注的科技公司，其目标是加强美国的军事武库。【原文：Divergent Technologies Inc. notched a $2.3 billion valuation in a new funding round as the startup expands its work for US weapons companies — making it the the latest tech company to attract investor attention while aiming to bolster the country’s military arsenal.】

item.title: 英国初创公司在纽约安装首台量子计算机
item.description: 一家英国初创公司在曼哈顿的一个数据中心安装了纽约市第一台量子计算机。【原文：A British startup has installed New York City’s first quantum computer at a data center in Manhattan.】

item.title: 贝森特与中国的会谈指向一个熟悉的模式
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国进行第一任期会谈期间，他的一位杰出鹰派人物--贸易沙皇罗伯特-莱特希泽--曾一度将一个道具带入椭圆形办公室会议。【原文：For a time during US President Donald Trump’s first-term talks with China one of his pre-eminent hawks, trade czar Robert Lighthizer, took to bringing a prop into Oval Office meetings.】

item.title: 随着资本市场复苏，智利企业掀起债券销售狂潮
item.description: 随着新兴市场国家和企业以至少十年来最快的速度抛售美元债券，智利企业也在竞相抛售比索债券和海外债券，因为当地市场正在恢复到科维德事件前的水平。【原文：As emerging market countries and corporates sell dollar bonds at the fastest pace in at least a decade, Chilean companies are racing to sell debt in pesos as well as abroad, as the local market recovers toward pre-Covid levels.】

item.title: 国际清算银行警告：市场反弹掩盖了世界经济的深刻裂痕
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）警告说，近期金融市场的上涨并没有充分反映主权债务增加和世界贸易中断所带来的危险。【原文：Recent gains in financial markets don’t adequately reflect dangers looming from higher sovereign debt and disrupted world trade, the Bank for International Settlements warned.】

item.title: BPM 银行计划将 SRT 与 25 亿欧元的企业贷款挂钩
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，Banco BPM SpA 计划发布一项与约 25 亿欧元（29 亿美元）企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移计划。【原文：Banco BPM SpA plans to issue a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of about €2.5 billion ($2.9 billion) of corporate loans, say people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德将 30 亿美元的 Rieder 共同基金转为 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德公司正在将全球固定收益首席投资官里克-里德（Rick Rieder）管理的两只共同基金转换为 ETF，以便将这些策略更好地融入公司蓬勃发展的模型投资组合生态系统。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is converting two mutual funds — managed by Chief Investment Officer of global fixed income Rick Rieder — into ETFs to better fit the strategies into the firm’s booming model-portfolio ecosystem.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师认为美联储降息导致股市涨势受阻
item.description: 华尔街顶级策略师表示，在美联储本周预期降息后，创纪录的美股涨势有可能暂时失去动力。【原文：Top Wall Street strategists said the record-setting US stock rally risks temporarily running out of steam after an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut this week.】

item.description:
从中国进口商品的公司对短期贷款的需求激增。【原文：

Demand for short-term loans is spiking among companies that import merchandise from China.

】

item.title: 关键铬铁堡垒受制于南非的能源成本
item.description: 南非能源价格的持续上涨有可能扼杀一个制造不锈钢关键原料的行业，并改变美国和其他国家的供应链。【原文：A sustained rise in energy prices in South Africa is threatening to smother an industry that makes a key stainless-steel ingredient and alter supply chains to the US and other nations.】

item.title: 美联储对宽松前景的反击将推翻看涨押注
item.description:

】

item.title: 洪水和关税风险加剧，巴基斯坦维持关键利率不变
item.description: 巴基斯坦央行连续第三次在政策会议上维持关键利率不变，表明在山洪暴发和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策增加风险的情况下将保持谨慎。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank kept its key rate unchanged for a third straight policy meeting, signaling caution as flash floods and US President Donald Trump’s tariffs add to risks.】

item.title: 印度贸易逆差缩小，出口商仍在为关税做准备
item.description: 印度 8 月份的贸易赤字有所收窄，尽管出口商们正准备承受唐纳德-特朗普总统征收 50%关税带来的痛苦，这些关税可能会打击多个劳动密集型行业。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed in August, even as exporters brace for pain from President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs, which threaten to hit several labor-intensive sectors.】

item.title: 降息临近，华尔街几乎放弃了对贸易的担忧
item.description: 对美联储降息的乐观情绪，让华尔街许多人对全球贸易战的焦虑牢牢地留在了后视镜中。【原文：Optimism over Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts is putting anxiety over a global trade war firmly in the rearview mirror for many on Wall Street.】

item.title: 韩国 FuriosaAI 公司计划在首次公开募股前筹集 3 亿美元资金
item.description: 位于首尔的芯片初创公司 FuriosaAI 正准备在潜在的首次公开募股前融资回合中筹集超过 3 亿美元的资金，以挑战英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：FuriosaAI, the Seoul-based chip startup seeking to challenge Nvidia Corp., is preparing to raise more than $300 million in a potential pre-initial public offering funding round.】

item.title: 外国投资者为寻求收益抢购南非债券
item.description: 外国投资者正在抢购南非债券，以寻求更高的实际收益。【原文：Foreign investors are snapping up South African bonds as they search out higher real yields.】

item.title: 瑞士上议院将就瑞银 30 亿美元资本措施进行表决
item.description: 瑞士立法者将于周一就第二次试图推迟银行资本质量新规则的投票进行表决，新规则将使瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的资本要求提高约 30 亿美元。【原文：Swiss lawmakers will on Monday vote on a second attempt to delay new rules for bank capital quality which are set to lift UBS Group AG’s capital requirements by some $3 billion.】

item.title: 中国建筑商国际发展有限公司地方债务重组获债权人批准
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI Holdings Group Co.【原文：CIFI Holdings Group Co. received creditors’ support for reorganizing about 10.1 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) of onshore debt, becoming the latest defaulted Chinese developer to make a breakthrough in a typically protracted process.】

item.title: Anthropic 发现企业主要利用人工智能实现工作自动化
item.description: 根据OpenAI竞争对手的一份新报告，企业绝大多数依赖Anthropic的人工智能软件来实现工作自动化，而不是进行协作，这增加了人工智能颠覆生计的风险。【原文：Businesses are overwhelmingly relying on Anthropic’s artificial intelligence software to automate rather than collaborate on work, according to a new report from the OpenAI rival, adding to the risk that AI will upend livelihoods.】

item.title: 库存吸引买家，加拿大房屋销售连续第五个月增长
item.description: 由于大量房源吸引买家重返市场，加拿大房屋销售连续第五个月增长。【原文：Canadian home sales rose for a fifth straight month as a buildup of listings lured buyers back to the market.】

item.title: 法国汽车金融公司 RCI 首次进军强劲的 AT1 市场
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）的汽车融资部门 RCI Banque SA 正寻求出售其首笔附加一级债券，而此时投资者正在抢购这种高风险的债务。【原文：Renault SA’s car financing unit RCI Banque SA is looking to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond at a time when investors are snapping up this risky type of debt.】
